title: Buy Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company; target of Rs 720: Sharekhan - Moneycontrol.com
content: Buy Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company; target of Rs 720: Sharekhan  Moneycontrol.com
description: Sharekhan is bullish on Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company has recommended buy on the stock with a revised price target (PT) of Rs. 720 in its research report dated February 02, 2022.
